Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2012 04:17PM TRACY327 wrote: Hi everyone- Same thing for me- I am 42 years old first mamo- and got the dreaded call- calcifications detected 11:00 on right breast- Biopsy is scheduled for tom morning- The worrying is the worst part- all this is new to me too.  No cancer in my family so just hoping for the best.  Butterflylady please keep us posted- I am sending you out prayers
